languages.text: Как только ваш корабль приближается к неопознанному небесному телу, машинные духи начинают бушевать по всем палубам от капитанского мостика до грузовых отсеков. Двигатели отказываются подчиняться, и пустотный корабль несется в самый эпицентр аномалии, словно стрела, пущенная в цель.

traits.locale_text: Как только корабль Вольного Торговца приближается к неопознанному небесному телу, машинные духи начинают бушевать по всем палубам от капитанского мостика до грузовых отсеков. Двигатели отказываются подчиняться, и пустотный корабль несется в самый эпицентр аномалии, словно стрела, пущенная в цель.

languages.text: When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.
languages.original_text: Как только ваш корабль приближается к неопознанному небесному телу, машинные духи начинают бушевать по всем палубам от капитанского мостика до грузовых отсеков. Двигатели отказываются подчиняться, и пустотный корабль несется в самый эпицентр аномалии, словно стрела, пущенная в цель.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the unidentified celestial body, machine spirits become frantic on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds. Engines uncooperative, the voidship is hurtling toward the exact epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow towards the bull's eye.

As soon as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the unidentified celestial body, machine spirits become frantic on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds. Engines uncooperative, the voidship is hurtling toward the exact epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow towards the bull's eye.

As soon as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches the unidentified celestial body, machine spirits become frantic on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds. Engines uncooperative, the voidship is hurtling toward the exact epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow towards a bull's eye.

When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.

When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.

When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.

languages.text: 当行商浪人的飞船接近某个不明天体时，从舰长室到货舱，所有甲板上的机魂都仿佛发了疯一样。飞船的引擎拒绝执行命令，行商浪人的虚空舰像离弦的箭一样冲向了天体的中心。
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.

traits.locale_text: 当行商浪人的飞船接近某个不明天体时，从舰长室到货舱，所有甲板上的机魂都仿佛发了疯一样。飞船的引擎拒绝执行命令，行商浪人的虚空舰像离弦的箭一样冲向了天体的中心。

languages.text: Cuando la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se aproxima al cuerpo celeste no identificado, los espíritus máquina de todas las cubiertas, desde el puente del capitán a las bodegas de carga, se vuelven locos. Los motores se niegan a obedecer, lanzando la nave del vacío contra el epicentro de la anomalía como una flecha.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.

traits.locale_text: Cuando la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se aproxima al cuerpo celeste no identificado, los espíritus máquina de todas las cubiertas, desde el puente del capitán a las bodegas de carga, se vuelven locos. Los motores se niegan a obedecer, lanzando la nave del vacío contra el epicentro de la anomalía como una flecha.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーの船が正体不明の天体に近づくと、艦橋から貨物室に至るまで、全甲板の機械精霊（マシーンスピリット）が狂いだした。エンジンが作動せず、ヴォイドシップは異変の震源地に向かって矢のように突進していく。
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの船が正体不明の天体に近づくと、艦橋から貨物室に至るまで、全甲板の機械精霊（マシーンスピリット）が狂いだした。エンジンが作動せず、ヴォイドシップは異変の震源地に向かって矢のように突進していく。

languages.text: Als sich das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} dem unbekannten Himmelskörper nähert, spielen die Maschinengeister auf sämtlichen Decks verrückt, von der Brücke bis zu den Frachträumen. Die Triebwerke kooperieren nicht mehr und schleudern das Raumschiff in Richtung des Epizentrums einer Anomalie wie einen Pfeil in Richtung Ziel.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.

traits.locale_text: Als sich das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} dem unbekannten Himmelskörper nähert, spielen die Maschinengeister auf sämtlichen Decks verrückt, von der Brücke bis zu den Frachträumen. Die Triebwerke kooperieren nicht mehr und schleudern das Raumschiff in Richtung des Epizentrums einer Anomalie wie einen Pfeil in Richtung Ziel.

languages.text: Lorsque le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} s'approche du corps céleste non identifié, les esprits de la machine de chaque pont, de la passerelle de commandement à la soute, s'affolent. Les moteurs refusent de coopérer et précipitent le croiseur stellaire vers l'épicentre de l'anomalie, comme une flèche vers sa cible.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} s'approche du corps céleste non identifié, les esprits de la machine de chaque pont, de la passerelle de commandement à la soute, s'affolent. Les moteurs refusent de coopérer et précipitent le croiseur stellaire vers l'épicentre de l'anomalie, comme une flèche vers sa cible.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in gemisi, tanımlanamayan gök cismine yaklaşıyor ve kaptan köprüsünden ambarlara kadar her güvertedeki makine ruhları çılgına dönüyor. Motorlar, iş birliği yapmayı reddediyor. Uçsuz gemisi, hedefine doğru fırlayan bir ok misali anomalinin merkezine doğru hızla sürükleniyor.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader's ship draws near the unidentified celestial body, the machine spirits on every deck, from the captain's bridge to the cargo holds, become frantic. The engines are refusing to cooperate, sending the voidship hurtling toward the epicentre of the anomaly like an arrow toward a target.
